missing_value_handling.comment: No missing values found after cleaning. Imputation not required.

variance_feature_check.comment: No constant or near-zero variance columns found.

outlier_handling.comment: A small number of outliers in 'sepal.width' (indices: [15, 32, 33, 60]) are retained for potential informative value.

feature_engineering.category_feature_encoding: label encoding (for modeling only, target in CSV remains original string)
feature_engineering.comment: No further feature transformation or encoding required.

feature_selection.rationale: Strong correlation detected between 'petal.length' and 'petal.width' as per EDA. Both all-feature and single-petal feature subsets will be tested.

model_selection.rationale: Selected combination with highest mean macro F1 across 5 folds. Performance metrics and full CV log available in cross_validation_results.
